verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> in the <S%G4003>fifteenth<s%> <S%G2094>year<s%> of the <S%G2231>reign<s%> of <S%G5086>Tiberius<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> when <S%G4194>Pontius<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> was <S%G2230>governor<s%> of <S%G2453>Judea,<s%> and <S%G2264>Herod<s%> was <S%G5067>tetrarch<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> was <S%G5067>tetrarch<s%> of the <S%G5561>region<s%> of <S%G2484>Ituraea<s%> and <S%G5139>Trachonitis,<s%> and <S%G3078>Lysanias<s%> was <S%G5067>tetrarch<s%> of Abilene,

in the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priesthood<s%> of <S%G452>Annas<s%> and <S%G2533>Caiaphas,<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> to <S%G2491>John,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2197>Zacharias,<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

And he <S%G2064>came<s%> into <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4066>district<s%> <S%G4066>around<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> a <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> for the <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins;<s%>

as it is <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of the <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> "The <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2090>'Make<s%> <S%G2090>ready<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4160>Make<s%> His <S%G5147>paths<s%> <S%G2117>straight.<s%>

<S%G3956>'Every<s%> <S%G5327>ravine<s%> shall be <S%G4137>filled<s%> up, And <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> and <S%G1015>hill<s%> shall be <S%G5013>brought<s%> <S%G5013>low;<s%> And the <S%G4646>crooked<s%> shall <S%G1510>become<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G2117>straight,<s%> And the <S%G5138>rough<s%> <S%G3598>roads<s%> <S%G3006>smooth;<s%>
And <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> shall <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G4992>salvation<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>'"

He <S%G3767>therefore<s%> [began] <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> who were <S%G1607>going<s%> out to be <S%G907>baptized<s%> by him, "You <S%G1081>brood<s%> of <S%G2191>vipers,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G5263>warned<s%> you to <S%G5343>flee<s%> from the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> to <S%G3195>come<s%>?

<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> <S%G4160>bring<s%> <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G2590>fruits<s%> in <S%G514>keeping<s%> with <S%G3341>repentance,<s%> and do not <S%G757>begin<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> 'We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> for our <S%G3962>father,<s%>' for I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you that <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> from <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> to <S%G1453>raise<s%> up <S%G5043>children<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

"And <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G513>axe<s%> is <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2749>laid<s%> at the <S%G4491>root<s%> of the <S%G1186>trees;<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> that does not <S%G4160>bear<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> is <S%G1581>cut<s%> <S%G1581>down<s%> and <S%G906>thrown<s%> into the <S%G4442>fire.<s%>"
And the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> were <S%G1905>questioning<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3767>"Then<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall we <S%G4160>do<s%>?"

And he would <S%G611>answer<s%> and <S%G3004>say<s%> to them, "Let the man who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5509>tunics<s%> <S%G3330>share<s%> with him who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3361>none;<s%> and let him who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1033>food<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3668>likewise.<s%>"
And [some] tax-gatherers <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized,<s%> and they <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall we <S%G4160>do<s%>?"
And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4238>"Collect<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G4183>more<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> what you have been <S%G1299>ordered<s%> to."

And [some] <S%G4754>soldiers<s%> were <S%G1905>questioning<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "And <S%G5101>[what<s%> about] us, what shall we <S%G4160>do<s%>?" And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Do not <S%G1286>take<s%> <S%G1286>money<s%> from <S%G3367>anyone<s%> by <S%G1286>force,<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> <S%G4811>accuse<s%> [anyone] <S%G4811>falsely,<s%> and be <S%G714>content<s%> with your <S%G3800>wages.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> while the <S%G2992>people<s%> were in a <S%G4328>state<s%> of <S%G4328>expectation<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> were <S%G1260>wondering<s%> in their <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> as to <S%G3379>whether<s%> he might be the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them <S%G3956>all,<s%> "As for me, I <S%G907>baptize<s%> you with <S%G5204>water;<s%> but One is <S%G2064>coming<s%> who is <S%G2478>mightier<s%> than I, and I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G2425>fit<s%> to <S%G3089>untie<s%> the <S%G2438>thong<s%> of His <S%G5266>sandals;<s%> He will <S%G907>baptize<s%> you with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> and <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

"And His <S%G4425>winnowing<s%> <S%G4425>fork<s%> is in His <S%G5495>hand<s%> to <S%G7039>thoroughly<s%> <S%G7039>clear<s%> His <S%G257>threshing<s%> <S%G257>floor,<s%> and to <S%G4863>gather<s%> the <S%G4621>wheat<s%> into His <S%G596>barn;<s%> but He will <S%G2618>burn<s%> up the <S%G892>chaff<s%> with <S%G762>unquenchable<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%>"
<S%G3767>So<s%> with <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G3870>exhortations<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G2097>preached<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

But when <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5068>tetrarch<s%> was <S%G1651>reproved<s%> by him on <S%G4012>account<s%> of <S%G2266>Herodias,<s%> his brother's <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and on <S%G4012>account<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G4190>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> had <S%G4160>done,<s%>
he <S%G4369>added<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to them <S%G3956>all,<s%> that he <S%G2623>locked<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> up in <S%G5438>prison.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> it <S%G1096>came<s%> about <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G907>baptized,<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was <S%G907>baptized,<s%> and while He was <S%G4336>praying,<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G455>opened,<s%>

and the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> upon Him in <S%G4984>bodily<s%> <S%G1491>form<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G4058>dove,<s%> and a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> "Thou <S%G1510>art<s%> My <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> in Thee I <S%G2106>am<s%> well-pleased."

And when He <S%G757>began<s%> His ministry, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G846>Himself<s%> was <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G5144>thirty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> of <S%G2094>age,<s%> <S%G1510>being<s%> <S%G3543>supposedly<s%> [the] <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2242>Eli,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G3158>Matthat,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3017>Levi,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3197>Melchi,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2388>Jannai,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G3161>Mattathias,<s%> the [son] of <S%G301>Amos,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3486>Nahum,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2069>Hesli,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3477>Naggai,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G3092>Maath,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3161>Mattathias,<s%> the [son] of <S%G4584>Semein,<s%> the [son] of <S%G7100>Josech,<s%> the [son] of <S%G7099>Joda,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G7097>Joanan,<s%> the [son] of <S%G4488>Rhesa,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> the [son] of <S%G4528>Shealtiel,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3518>Neri,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G3197>Melchi,<s%> the [son] of <S%G78>Addi,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2973>Cosam,<s%> the [son] of <S%G1678>Elmadam,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2262>Er,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G2424>Joshua,<s%> the [son] of <S%G1663>Eliezer,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2497>Jorim,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3103>Matthat,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3017>Levi,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G4826>Simeon,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2455>Judah,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2494>Jonam,<s%> the [son] of <S%G1662>Eliakim,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G3190>Melea,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3303>Menna,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3160>Mattatha,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3481>Nathan,<s%> the [son] of <S%G7035>David,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G2421>Jesse,<s%> the [son] of <S%G7098>Obed,<s%> the [son] of <S%G1003>Boaz,<s%> the [son] of <S%G4533>Salmon,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3476>Nahshon,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G284>Amminadab,<s%> the [son] of <S%G7002>Admin,<s%> the [son] of <S%G689>Ram,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2074>Hezron,<s%> the [son] of <S%G5329>Perez,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2455>Judah,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> the [son] of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2291>Terah,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3493>Nahor,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G4588>Serug,<s%> the [son] of <S%G4466>Reu,<s%> the [son] of <S%G5317>Peleg,<s%> the [son] of <S%G1443>Heber,<s%> the [son] of <S%G4527>Shelah,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G2536>Cainan,<s%> the [son] of <S%G742>Arphaxad,<s%> the [son] of <S%G4590>Shem,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3575>Noah,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2984>Lamech,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G3103>Methuselah,<s%> the [son] of <S%G1802>Enoch,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2391>Jared,<s%> the [son] of <S%G3121>Mahalaleel,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2536>Cainan,<s%>
the [son] of <S%G1800>Enosh,<s%> the [son] of <S%G4589>Seth,<s%> the [son] of <S%G76>Adam,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
